title: I want Elementalist Lux?
body:
For some reason I want Elementalist Lux... Why do I want $35 skin with icons and a ward? Why did Riot and friends make me want to get her? WHY U DO THIS RIOT?! It's such a nice, beautiful skin, I'm jealous of everyone who has it, especially those who have the Master Elementalist Edition. Nvm I'm told it's not that great but... I still like it and yes, I'm obsessing over a new popular skin. Had to get my thoughts out there. :3

Edit: I finally got it! I think it's sorta kind of worth getting the Master Elementalist Edition if you like it a lot, you get 10 icons (I mean 11 icons) caus they would be 250 RP each which would mean in total of 2500 RP, 10 skins in one and a ward adding up to 1450 RP instead of just getting only the skin (2000 RP) and 5 icons (1,250 RP) aahhhh XD

replies.body:
For me it's the most beautiful 'fantasy' skin out there, especially since it's an ultimate skin.
For example, DJ Sona is modern, Pulsefire is futuristic, I guess SGU is fantasy but it's not as 'magic themed'.

I'd totally get Elementalist Lux myself if I would use Lux more but I'm currently obsessing over Talon :P

But yeah definitely, Elementalist Lux is absolutely beautiful, definitely my favorite ultimate skin so far.

Talon's rework is great, I had a go of playing him myself. XD
Talon is love, Talon is life
It is my favourite skin now, I got the master elementalist edition as well, and I love how I purposefully didn't find out how to get the master forms just so I can discover them myself.

YES! It's actually a really cool skin to play with when it's worth getting because every elemental look is at its peak and high quality from voice acting to casting every ability, I hear a lot of comments saying it's "beautiful", oh just so beautiful. ^^
